title: An Act relative to critical incident intervention by emergency service providers

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Hawkins of Attleboro, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2629) of James K. Hawkins relative to providing critical incident intervention services for emergency service providers.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
